boat.name: Chiranga
boat.full_description:
'Chiranga' is a totally refurbished professionally constructed ferro cement Dutch sailing barge, built in 1971, on a ‘Lemsteraak’ design.

She can sleep eight people in three cabins with good headroom throughout, making her an ideal liveaboard.
boat.construction_details: Ferrocement overlaid with a flexi-teak deck in 2015
boat.short_description: 'Chiranga' is a ferrocement gaff ketch based on the Lemsteraak Dutch Sailing Barge design.

for_sales.sales_text:
Beautifully constructed copy of a traditional long keel Dutch trader. Eight berths including full size double master cabin. Standing headroom, carpet and lovely wood panelling throughout. Full recent overhaul/update of engine and all systems. The ultimate go anywhere, liveaboard sailing barge.

Owner sadly forced to sell due to terminal ill health. Offers?
